segments.text: My eyes keep returning to those children and their precarious cookie mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy is really taking a risk, perched so high on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are splayed out; it looks like it could go any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching so eagerly into the cookie jar, one hand holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His determination is admirable, but the danger outweighs it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, reaching up, a silent conspirator in this daring feat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They’re so focused on those cookies, they don't even see the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could seriously injure himself on the counter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And with the floor being wet, a fall would be even worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can just imagine the mess if he drops the plate and the cookies scatter.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a perfect storm of youthful ambition and potential disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: These little adventurers need a safer way to get their treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are blissfully unaware of the consequences.
segments.speaker: PAR
